channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for VA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for VA

item.title: Report X-2023061208
item.description:
Report X-2023061208

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-18T15:09:56+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-15
  • City: CHANTILLY
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found in trailer 827123 from Hagerstown leaking not following orientation arrows. Package was taken out of trailer and placed in plastic salvage drum. The spill on trailer flaps was wiped up with cleaning pads. DescribePack: One of the lids on one of the bottles of degreaser was not on all the way. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in plastic salvage drum following orientation arrows.
